skills.skill: Hadoop Ecosystem (Map Reduce, Hive, Pig, Spark, Kafka, HBase, HDFS, H-catalog, Zookeeper, Oozie/Airflow)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for implementation and ongoing administration of Hadoop infrastructure.
Manage the life cycle of multiple Hadoop clusters and perform infrastructure monitoring, logging, and alerting.
Performance tuning of Hadoop clusters and capacity planning at application/queue level.
Monitor Hadoop cluster connectivity, security, and file system management.
Investigate and analyze new technical possibilities, tools, and techniques to reduce complexity, improve delivery process, and increase business value.
Fix issues, perform RCA, and suggest solutions for infrastructure/service components. Collaborate with application teams to install updates, patches, and version upgrades.
Maintain central dashboards for system, data, utilization, and availability metrics.
Meet Service Level Agreement (SLA) targets and ensure all changes to Production systems are planned and approved.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
